name: Muk
flavorText:
Thickly covered
with a filthy,
vile sludge. It is so toxic, even
its footprints
contain poison.

pokemon.name: Grimer
pokemon.flavorText:
Appears in filthy
areas. Thrives by
sucking up polluted sludge
that is pumped
out of factories.
